de.mrapp.android.adapter.expandablelist

Interface ExpandableListAdapterItemClickListener<GroupType,ChildType>

  • Type Parameters:
    GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the observed adapter's group items
    ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the observed adapter's child items

    public interface ExpandableListAdapterItemClickListener<GroupType,ChildType>
    Defines the interface, all listeners, which should be notified, when an item of an ExpandableListAdapter has been clicked by the user, must implement.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChildClicked(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, ChildType child, int childIndex, GroupType group, int groupIndex)
      The method, which is invoked, when a child item of the adapter has been clicked by the user.
      void onFooterClicked(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, android.view.View view, int index)
      The method, which is invoked, when a footer of the adapter view, the adapter is attached to, has been clicked by the user.
      void onGroupClicked(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, GroupType group, int index)
      The method, which is invoked, when a group item of the adapter has been clicked by the user.
      void onHeaderClicked(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, android.view.View view, int index)
      The method, which is invoked, when a header of the adapter view, the adapter is attached to, has been clicked by the user.

    • Method Detail

      • onGroupClicked

        void onGroupClicked(@NonNull
                    ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                    @NonNull
                    GroupType group,
                    int index)
        The method, which is invoked, when a group item of the adapter has been clicked by the user.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        group - The group item, which has been clicked by the user, as an instance of the generic type GroupType. The item may not be null
        index - The index of the group item, which has been clicked by the user, as an Integer value

      • onChildClicked

        void onChildClicked(@NonNull
                    ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                    @NonNull
                    ChildType child,
                    int childIndex,
                    @NonNull
                    GroupType group,
                    int groupIndex)
        The method, which is invoked, when a child item of the adapter has been clicked by the user.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        child - The child item, which has been clicked by the user, as an instance of the generic type ChildType. The child item may not be null
        childIndex - The index of the child item, which has been clicked by the user, as an Integer value
        group - The group item, the child, which has been clicked by the user, belongs to, as an instance of the generic type GroupType. The group item may not be null
        groupIndex - The index of the group item, the child, which has been clicked by the user, belongs to, as an Integer value

      • onHeaderClicked

        void onHeaderClicked(@NonNull
                     ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                     @NonNull
                     android.view.View view,
                     int index)
        The method, which is invoked, when a header of the adapter view, the adapter is attached to, has been clicked by the user.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        view - The header view, which has been clicked by the user, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        index - The index of the header, which has been clicked by the user, as an Integer value

      • onFooterClicked

        void onFooterClicked(@NonNull
                     ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                     @NonNull
                     android.view.View view,
                     int index)
        The method, which is invoked, when a footer of the adapter view, the adapter is attached to, has been clicked by the user.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        view - The footer view, which has been clicked by the user, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        index - The index of the footer, which has been clicked by the user, as an Integer value
